OutputFileStream
typedef struct
OutputFileStream

The struct that appends formatted output to a file.

General usage is as follows:

OutputFileStream *stream=new(OutputFileStream);
OutputFileStream_t.<func to call>(stream, <params>);
...
delete(OutputFileStream,stream);
Variables
output
FILE *output

  • Default: NULL

errorCode
int errorCode

Stores the error code if any errors occur while writing to the output file.

  • Default: 0

Functions
setFileFromPntr
bool (
*setFileFromPntr
)(OutputFileStream *self, FILE *fPntr)

Sets the file for the output stream to write to from an already opened file.  The file is assumed to be in write mode.  This is useful for setting the output file to stdout.

Parameters
self

The file stream to perform the operation on.

fPntr

The pointer to the already opened file to write to.

Returns

True if the output file was changed, false if not.
